description: Creates or updates label. A label classifies an event as fraudulent or legitimate. Labels are associated with event types and used to train supervised machine learning models in Amazon Fraud Detector.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A collection of key and value pairs. (dict) --- A key and value pair. A tag key. A value assigned to a tag key.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: A value assigned to a tag key.
